```diff
- 
+ import os
+ import json
+ from flask import Flask, render_template, request, send_from_directory
+ from PIL import Image
+ import glob
+ from werkzeug.utils import secure_filename
+ 
+ app = Flask(__name__, 
+     static_folder="app/static",
+     template_folder="app/templates")
+ 
+ # é…ç½®
+ PHOTOS_DIR = 'photos'
+ THUMBNAILS_DIR = 'app/static/img/thumbnails'
+ THUMBNAIL_SIZE = (300, 300)  # ç¼©ç•¥å›¾å°ºå¯¸
+ 
+ # ç¡®ä¿ç¼©ç•¥å›¾ç›®å½•å­˜åœ¨
+ os.makedirs(THUMBNAILS_DIR, exist_ok=True)
+ 
+ def get_image_files():
+     """è·å–photosç›®å½•ä¸­çš„æ‰€æœ‰å›¾ç‰‡"""
+     extensions = ['jpg', 'jpeg', 'png', 'gif']
+     image_files = []
+     
+     for ext in extensions:
+         image_files.extend(glob.glob(f'{PHOTOS_DIR}/*.{ext}'))
+         image_files.extend(glob.glob(f'{PHOTOS_DIR}/*.{ext.upper()}'))
+     
+     return sorted(image_files)
+ 
+ def create_thumbnail(image_path):
+     """ä¸ºå›¾ç‰‡åˆ›å»ºç¼©ç•¥å›¾"""
+     filename = os.path.basename(image_path)
+     thumbnail_path = os.path.join(THUMBNAILS_DIR, filename)
+     
+     # å¦‚æœç¼©ç•¥å›¾å·²å­˜åœ¨ï¼Œåˆ™è·³è¿‡
+     if os.path.exists(thumbnail_path):
+         return thumbnail_path
+     
+     try:
+         with Image.open(image_path) as img:
+             img.thumbnail(THUMBNAIL_SIZE)
+             img.save(thumbnail_path)
+         return thumbnail_path
+     except Exception as e:
+         print(f"åˆ›å»ºç¼©ç•¥å›¾å¤±è´¥: {e}")
+         return None
+ 
+ def get_photos_with_thumbnails():
+     """è·å–æ‰€æœ‰ç…§ç‰‡åŠå…¶ç¼©ç•¥å›¾"""
+     image_files = get_image_files()
+     photos = []
+     
+     for image_path in image_files:
+         filename = os.path.basename(image_path)
+         thumbnail_path = create_thumbnail(image_path)
+         
+         if thumbnail_path:
+             photos.append({
+                 'filename': filename,
+                 'path': image_path,
+                 'thumbnail': '/static/img/thumbnails/' + filename
+             })
+     
+     return photos
+ 
+ @app.route('/')
+ def index():
+     photos = get_photos_with_thumbnails()
+     return render_template('index.html', photos=photos)
+ 
+ @app.route('/photo/<path:filename>')
+ def get_photo(filename):
+     return send_from_directory(PHOTOS_DIR, filename)
+ 
+ if __name__ == '__main__':
+     app.run(debug=True, host='0.0.0.0') 
```

+             <p class="text-gray-600 text-lg">æš‚æ— ç…§ç‰‡ã€‚è¯·å°†ç…§ç‰‡æ”¾å…¥ photos ç›®å½•ã€‚</p>

+ <div class="photo-modal" id="photoModal">

+ {% block scripts %}
+ <script>
+     document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
+         // æ‡’åŠ è½½å›¾ç‰‡
+         const lazyImages = document.querySelectorAll('.lazy-load');
+         
+         if ('IntersectionObserver' in window) {
+             const imageObserver = new IntersectionObserver((entries, observer) => {
+                 entries.forEach(entry => {
+                     if (entry.isIntersecting) {
+                         const img = entry.target;
+                         img.src = img.dataset.src;
+                         img.classList.add('loaded');
+                         imageObserver.unobserve(img);
+                     }
+                 });
+             });
+ 
+             lazyImages.forEach(img => {
+                 imageObserver.observe(img);
+             });
+         } else {
+             // é™çº§æ–¹æ¡ˆ
+             lazyImages.forEach(img => {
+                 img.src = img.dataset.src;
+                 img.classList.add('loaded');
+             });
+         }
+ 
+         // æ¨¡æ€æ¡†åŠŸèƒ½
+         const modal = document.getElementById('photoModal');
+         const modalImg = document.getElementById('modalImage');
+         const closeModal = document.getElementById('closeModal');
+         const photoItems = document.querySelectorAll('.photo-item');
+ 
+         photoItems.forEach(item => {
+             item.addEventListener('click', function() {
+                 const filename = this.dataset.filename;
+                 modalImg.src = `/photo/${filename}`;
+                 modal.classList.add('active');
+                 document.body.style.overflow = 'hidden';
+             });
+         });
+ 
+         closeModal.addEventListener('click', function() {
+             modal.classList.remove('active');
+             document.body.style.overflow = '';
+             // å»¶è¿Ÿæ¸…é™¤å›¾ç‰‡æºï¼Œä»¥ä¾¿åœ¨å…³é—­åŠ¨ç”»æœŸé—´ä»ç„¶æ˜¾ç¤º
+             setTimeout(() => {
+                 modalImg.src = '';
+             }, 300);
+         });
+ 
+         // ç‚¹å‡»èƒŒæ™¯å…³é—­æ¨¡æ€æ¡†
+         modal.addEventListener('click', function(e) {
+             if (e.target === modal) {
+                 closeModal.click();
+             }
+         });
+ 
+         // ESC é”®å…³é—­æ¨¡æ€æ¡†
+         document.addEventListener('keydown', function(e) {
+             if (e.key === 'Escape' && modal.classList.contains('active')) {
+                 closeModal.click();
+             }
+         });
+     });
+ </script>
+ {% endblock %}

## ä¸ªäººæ‘„å½±ä½œå“é›†ç½‘ç«™åŠŸèƒ½ä»‹ç»

æˆ‘ä»¬å·²ç»åˆ›å»ºäº†ä¸€ä¸ªåŸºäºFlaskæ¡†æ¶çš„ä¸ªäººæ‘„å½±ä½œå“é›†å±•ç¤ºç½‘ç«™ï¼Œå®ƒå…·æœ‰ä»¥ä¸‹ç‰¹ç‚¹ï¼š

1. **å“åº”å¼è®¾è®¡**ï¼šä½¿ç”¨Tailwind CSSæ¡†æ¶ï¼Œç¡®ä¿ç½‘ç«™åœ¨å„ç§è®¾å¤‡ä¸Šéƒ½æœ‰è‰¯å¥½çš„è§†è§‰æ•ˆæœã€‚

+             if (menuToggle && mobileMenu) {
+                 menuToggle.addEventListener('click', function() {
+                     mobileMenu.classList.toggle('hidden');
+                     if (!mobileMenu.classList.contains('hidden')) {
+                         menuToggle.innerHTML = '<i class="fas fa-times"></i>';
+                     } else {
+                         menuToggle.innerHTML = '<i class="fas fa-bars"></i>';
+                     }
+                 });
+             }
+         });
+     </script>
      
      {% block scripts %}{% endblock %}
```

  {% block scripts %}
  <script>
      document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
+         // è·å–æ‰€æœ‰ç…§ç‰‡
+         const photoItems = document.querySelectorAll('.photo-item');
+         const photoModal = document.getElementById('photoModal');
+         const modalImage = document.getElementById('modalImage');
+         const modalCaption = document.getElementById('modalCaption');
+         const closeModal = document.getElementById('closeModal');
+         const prevButton = document.getElementById('prevPhoto');
+         const nextButton = document.getElementById('nextPhoto');
+         
+         // å½“å‰ç…§ç‰‡ç´¢å¼•
+         let currentIndex = 0;
+         
+         // æ‰€æœ‰ç…§ç‰‡æ•°æ®
+         const photos = Array.from(photoItems).map(item => ({
+             filename: item.dataset.filename,
+             index: parseInt(item.dataset.index)
+         }));
+         
+         // æ‰“å¼€æ¨¡æ€æ¡†
+         function openModal(index) {
+             currentIndex = index;
+             const photo = photos[index];
+             modalImage.src = `/photo/${photo.filename}`;
+             modalCaption.textContent = photo.filename;
+             photoModal.classList.add('active');
+             document.body.style.overflow = 'hidden';
+         }
+         
+         // å…³é—­æ¨¡æ€æ¡†
+         function closeModalHandler() {
+             photoModal.classList.remove('active');
+             document.body.style.overflow = '';
+             // å»¶è¿Ÿæ¸…é™¤å›¾ç‰‡æºï¼Œä»¥ä¾¿åœ¨å…³é—­åŠ¨ç”»æœŸé—´ä»ç„¶æ˜¾ç¤º
+             setTimeout(() => {
+                 modalImage.src = '';
+             }, 300);
+         }
+         
+         // æ˜¾ç¤ºä¸Šä¸€å¼ ç…§ç‰‡
+         function showPrevPhoto() {
+             let newIndex = currentIndex - 1;
+             if (newIndex < 0) {
+                 newIndex = photos.length - 1;
+             }
+             openModal(newIndex);
+         }
+         
+         // æ˜¾ç¤ºä¸‹ä¸€å¼ ç…§ç‰‡
+         function showNextPhoto() {
+             let newIndex = currentIndex + 1;
+             if (newIndex >= photos.length) {
+                 newIndex = 0;
+             }
+             openModal(newIndex);
+         }
+         
+         // æ·»åŠ äº‹ä»¶ç›‘å¬å™¨
+         photoItems.forEach(item => {
+             item.addEventListener('click', function() {
+                 const index = parseInt(this.dataset.index);
+                 openModal(index);
+             });
+         });
+         
+         // å…³é—­æŒ‰é’®
+         closeModal.addEventListener('click', closeModalHandler);
+         
+         // ç‚¹å‡»èƒŒæ™¯å…³é—­
+         photoModal.addEventListener('click', function(e) {
+             if (e.target === photoModal) {
+                 closeModalHandler();
+             }
+         });
+         
+         // ä¸Šä¸€å¼ /ä¸‹ä¸€å¼ æŒ‰é’®
+         prevButton.addEventListener('click', showPrevPhoto);
+         nextButton.addEventListener('click', showNextPhoto);
+         
+         // é”®ç›˜å¯¼èˆª
+         document.addEventListener('keydown', function(e) {
+             if (!photoModal.classList.contains('active')) return;
+             
+             if (e.key === 'Escape') {
+                 closeModalHandler();
+             } else if (e.key === 'ArrowLeft') {
+                 showPrevPhoto();
+             } else if (e.key === 'ArrowRight') {
+                 showNextPhoto();
+             }
+         });
+         
          // æ‡’åŠ è½½å›¾ç‰‡
          const lazyImages = document.querySelectorAll('.lazy-load');
              });
          }
- 
-         // æ¨¡æ€æ¡†åŠŸèƒ½
-         const modal = document.getElementById('photoModal');
-         const modalImg = document.getElementById('modalImage');
-         const closeModal = document.getElementById('closeModal');
-         const photoItems = document.querySelectorAll('.photo-item');
- 
-         photoItems.forEach(item => {
-             item.addEventListener('click', function() {
-                 const filename = this.dataset.filename;
-                 modalImg.src = `/photo/${filename}`;
-                 modal.classList.add('active');
-                 document.body.style.overflow = 'hidden';
-             });
-         });
- 
-         closeModal.addEventListener('click', function() {
-             modal.classList.remove('active');
-             document.body.style.overflow = '';
-             // å»¶è¿Ÿæ¸…é™¤å›¾ç‰‡æºï¼Œä»¥ä¾¿åœ¨å…³é—­åŠ¨ç”»æœŸé—´ä»ç„¶æ˜¾ç¤º
-             setTimeout(() => {
-                 modalImg.src = '';
-             }, 300);
-         });
- 
-         // ç‚¹å‡»èƒŒæ™¯å…³é—­æ¨¡æ€æ¡†
-         modal.addEventListener('click', function(e) {
-             if (e.target === modal) {
-                 closeModal.click();
-             }
-         });
- 
-         // ESC é”®å…³é—­æ¨¡æ€æ¡†
-         document.addEventListener('keydown', function(e) {
-             if (e.key === 'Escape' && modal.classList.contains('active')) {
-                 closeModal.click();
-             }
-         });
      });
  </script>
```

+                 setTimeout(() => {
+                     message.classList.add('translate-x-full');
+                     setTimeout(() => {
+                         message.remove();
+                     }, 500);
+                 }, dismissTime);
